channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A Waymo Robotaxi Hit a Kid by a School
item.description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration has opened an investigation into the incident.

item.title: Microsoft won’t stop buying AI chips from Nvidia, AMD, even after launching its own, Nadella says
item.description: Microsoft says its own chip leapfrogs those made by other cloud providers like Amazon and Google. But it needs more.

item.title: Apple Drops $2 Billion on Israeli AI Facial Tracking Company
item.description: Tim Cook is having a week.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX and xAI are reportedly holding merger talks
item.description: Two Elon Musk companies are reportedly planning to merge. On Thursday, Reuters reported that SpaceX and xAI are holding merger talks ahead of a planned IPO. Part of their plan is to launch AI data centers into space (but unfortunately, only as far as Earth's orbit).Last week, it was reported that Musk planned to take SpaceX public despite having once said it wouldn’t happen until the company had a presence on Mars. Now, the IPO could happen as early as this year. Shares of xAI would reportedly be exchanged for shares in SpaceX under the merger. Reuters reports that two entities were set up in ...

item.title: Whoa, Why Has This Frozen Lake Turned Green?
item.description: Scientists say it's a rare natural phenomenon driven by pollution and—yep—climate change.

item.title: The weirdest headphones at CES will launch on Kickstarter next month
item.description: There's never a shortage of weird tech debuting at CES every year. A new company called Tomorrow Doesn't Matter, or TDM, announced a peculiar pair of headphones at the show earlier this month with a feature no one has tried before. The Neo headphones can be rolled up like a hedgehog which turns them into […]

item.title: Amazon Digs Deeper Into the Comics Shelf With a ‘Sex Criminals’ Show
item.description: Prime Video's next comic target is Matt Fraction and Chip Zdarsky's supernaturally weird love story.

item.title: Appels illimités et 1 Go chez Free : le forfait 2 € sort de la préhistoire
item.description: L'opérateur historique du "zéro euro" vient de gonfler son petit forfait sans en toucher le prix. Finies les 2 heures d'appels chronométrées, place à l'illimité et à 1 Go de données.

item.title: Publishers are blocking the Internet Archive for fear AI scrapers can use it as a workaround
item.description: The Internet Archive has often been a valuable resource for journalists, from it's finding records of deleted tweets or providing academic texts for background research. However, the advent of AI has created a new tension between the parties. A few major publications have begun blocking the nonprofit digital library's access to their content based on concerns that AI companies' bots are using the Internet Archive's collections to indirectly scrape their articles."A lot of these AI businesses are looking for readily available, structured databases of content," Robert Hahn, head of business affa...

item.title: Fintech firm Marquis blames hack at firewall provider SonicWall for its data breach
item.description: The fintech giant said it plans to "seek recoupment of any expenses" from its firewall provider SonicWall after a 2025 data breach exposed customer firewall configurations.

item.title: Xiaomi 17 : on sait déjà tout sur le lancement mondial du smartphone
item.description: Un revendeur allemand vient de faire une boulette monumentale en listant le Xiaomi 17 avant l'heure. Prix, coloris inédit et surtout, une mauvaise nouvelle sur la batterie : on sait désormais presque tout avant le MWC 2026.

item.title: Meet Project Genie from Google, a world model it calls a stepping stone to AGI
item.description: Google DeepMind has released Project Genie, a new AI model that can build interactive virtual worlds. It's available now in the United States.

item.title: Zut alors! French government to ditch Zoom and Microsoft Teams in favor of homegrown tech, following security and snooping fears
item.description: France will replace Microsoft Teams and Zoom with Visio, a domestic platform featuring AI tools and sovereign cloud hosting.

item.title: The best foldable phone you can buy
item.description: A foldable phone isn’t for the faint of heart. They’re generally heavier, pricier, and have less capable cameras than a standard slab-style phone. They’re also still not as durable as regular smartphones, though they’re not nearly as fragile as they once were. In fact, thanks to Google, we finally have a foldable phone we can […]

item.title: Apple rachète la startup Q.ai : tout savoir sur la technologie de discours silencieux
item.description: En s'offrant la startup israélienne Q.ai, Apple s'assure une avance technologique majeure sur le traitement de la voix et des micro-mouvements faciaux.

item.title: The 30-Year Nostalgia Cycle Has Me Actually Excited for a PC With Fake Floppy Drives
item.description: I know you're desperately wondering about the floppy drives in this Maingear Retro98 desktop.

item.title: Satya Nadella insists people are using Microsoft’s Copilot AI a lot
item.description: With Microsoft spending many billions on data centers, and rumors that no one is using its AI, CEO Satya Nadella shared some usage numbers.

item.title: ‘Starfleet Academy’ Decides There Are Some Things Worth Keeping the Same
item.description: 'Vox in Excelso' puts the spotlight on the academy's Klingon cadet for a check-in on what's changed—and what hasn't—with one of the most enduring 'Star Trek' species.

item.title: The 45 Best Movies on HBO Max Right Now (February 2026)
item.description: One Battle After Another, The Smashing Machine, and Sinners are just a few of the movies you should be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: Voici le télescope ultime : 89 000 € pour une configuration haut de gamme digne d’un observatoire, et il est français !
item.description: Un nouveau type de télescope, destiné aux professionnels, s'affiche avec une simplicité d'utilisation inédite et a un prix extrêmement accessible. Développé par une société française, il promet de grands changements dans les observations astronomiques.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX and xAI might merge into one company
item.description: SpaceX and xAI, which are both led by Elon Musk, are "in discussions to merge" ahead of SpaceX's IPO that's planned for later this year, Reuters reports. The merger would help with SpaceX's plans to launch data centers into space, according to the publication. The specific timing and value of the potential merger are unclear. […]

item.title: Kids Are Overdosing on GLP-1 Drugs, and It Can Get Dangerous Fast
item.description: Poison control calls involving GLP-1 medications like semaglutide and tirzepatide have dramatically risen in recent years.
